initial_state: User is viewing a card in the card view with the attachments section visible.
steps: Click on the `Add attachment` field or drop files onto the card.
Select files from the disc if using the `Add attachment` field.
If the attachment is an image, click `Make cover` to use it as a cover.
expected_state: Selected attachments are added to the card and displayed in the attachments section, with the cover image shown in the list view if set.
